Name: Bayer Pharmaceuticals
Description: Pharmaceuticals, drugs and medicines manufacturer based in Germany.
How to Boycott: Don't buy Bayer Pharmaceuticals products. Don't sell Bayer Pharmaceuticals products. Check the details on packaging before you buy over the counter. Don't prescribe Bayer Pharmaceuticals products.
Alternatives: Ask pharmacist for non Bayer alternatives.

Name: Sudocrem
Description: Moisturising cream owned by Israeli pharmaceuticals giant, Teva.
Reason: Teva Pharmaceuticals operates in Occupied Palestine
How to Boycott: Don't buy Sudocrem products. Don't sell Sudocrem products.
Alternatives: Supermarket own brand products. Pharmacy own brand products. Ask pharmacist for non Teva alternatives.

Name: Teva Pharmaceuticals
Reason: Teva Pharmaceuticals operates in Occupied Palestine.
How to Boycott: Don't buy Teva Pharmaceuticals products. Don't sell Teva Pharmaceuticals products. Check the details on packaging before you buy over the counter. Most Teva products are generic drugs and can be substituted for other brands easily. Don't prescribe Teva Pharmaceuticals products.
Alternatives: Ask pharmacist for non Teva alternatives.
